definitions.definition: Steadfast adherence to a strict moral or ethical code .
The state of being wholesome ; unimpaired
The quality or condition of being complete ; pure
With regards to data encryption , ensuring that information is not altered by unauthorized persons in a way that is not detectable by authorized users.
The ability of systems to provide timely warnings to users when they should not be used for navigation .

main_definition: Steadfast adherence to a strict moral or ethical code .
secondary_definitions: The state of being wholesome ; unimpaired
The quality or condition of being complete ; pure
( cryptography ) With regards to data encryption , ensuring that information is not altered by unauthorized persons in a way that is not detectable by authorized users.
( aviation ) The ability of systems to provide timely warnings to users when they should not be used for navigation .
